desc: A boilerplate for React project that want a lot of flexibility. It allows to customize your project to fit exactly what you need. It contains a custom Babel, Webpack, ESLint, Prettier config as well as a custom Express.js server.
next-steps: Add a static type checking library like Flow or TypeScript
